LMNL.text: Bow swung finds tongue to fling out broad its name;

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r15_quatrain r16_line r17_phr

LMNL.text: Each mortal thing does one thing and the same:

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r15_quatrain
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_s r15_quatrain r18_line r19_phr

LMNL.text: Deals out that being indoors each one dwells;

LMNL.text: thát keeps all his goings graces;

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r29_sestet r30_s r31_quatrain
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r29_sestet r30_s r31_quatrain r38_line r39_phr

LMNL.text: Acts in God's eye what in God's eye he is —

r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r29_sestet r30_s r31_quatrain r40_line r41_phr

LMNL.text: for Christ plays in ten thousand places,

r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r29_sestet r30_s r43_couplet r46_phr r47_line

LMNL.text: To the Father through the features of men's faces.
